chatBotResponse.subOption: Welcome to SIA ChatBot how can I help you?
I can help you with the following:

The computer is slow.1: shut it down and restart it
The computer is slow.3: store data on an external disk or in your icloud storage

the computer does not switch on.1: check if the power is plugged
the computer does not switch on.2: check if electricity can reach the power socket

printer is not printing.4: Ensure You Have the Right Printer

the computer is making strange noises.3: Perform diagnostic tests on all hardware
the computer is making strange noises.4: Return BIOS settings to their default levels
